com.crudetech.i18n

Class I18nMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crudetech.i18n.I18nMarker

  • public class I18nMarker
extends Object
    Helper methods to mark strings do be included or excluded in I18n.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String _DNT(String s)
      This string should not be translated.
      static String _T(String s)
      This string shall be translated.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • _DNT

        public static String _DNT(String s)
        This string should not be translated. This is typically used for exception or log messages: throw new IllegalArgumentException(_DNT("The argument foo is not valid!"));

        DNT stands for Do Not Translate

        Parameters:
        s - The marked string.
        Returns:
        the parameter s unmodified.

      • _T

        public static String _T(String s)
        This string shall be translated. label.setText(_T("Caption to be translated"));
        Parameters:
        s - The marked string.
        Returns:
        the parameter s unmodified.
